description:
Rukia has been totally accepted by Ichigo`s circle of friends, and Ichigo continues his work as a Soul Reaper.  On this day, the two set out to exterminate a Hollow, but when they get to the location, they find nothing.  The soul they find there confirms that a Hollow had been there.  In any case, they hold a Konso to help the spirit cross over, unaware of a shadow lurking in the background.
Source: crunchyroll
